articles.title: Kinahan Cartel used African air ambulances to move cocaine into Europe - Sunday World
articles.description: The Kinahan mob moved cocaine across Africa in air ambulances, bought off officials for use of landing strips and took control of the key transport route to Europe making the Irish mob second only in importance to the Colombian Cartels.
